title: Diff eq.: No context, w/ tang. line approx. part - b

content.description: Consider the differential equation dy/dx = ey(3x2 - 6x) . Let y = f(x) be the particular solution to the differential equation that passes through (1, 0) .
content.question: Find y=f(x) , the particular solution to the differential equation that passes through (1, 0).

frqParts.text: Find y=f(x) , the particular solution to the differential equation that passes through (1, 0).

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
